name: Cyber Horny
description:
Cyber Horny - is an exciting 2D game, the essence of which is to find paired colors. And as a reward, you will receive an image with an incredibly beautiful girl.
This game will give you aesthetic pleasure. The faster you find the same pairs of colors, the more one of the girls will open up to you, and you will be able to fully enjoy her beauty!

Spend time in Cyber Horny not only with pleasure, but also with benefit – memory games will help you develop your visual memory.
Everything in Cyber Horny, from the interface to the music, is aimed at making you experience the real pleasure of this game!

Key Features:
- cyberpunk theme
- beautiful arts
- intuitive interface
- pleasant music
